system.description:
A specially made set of armor plates fitted with additional conduits and capacitors to bolster the effectiveness of energy weaponry.

Special: Any of the robot’s attacks which deal energy damage inflict +1 @fos[DC] if the robot is fitted with any voltaic frame armor. This bonus increases by +1 @fos[DC] for every two additional locations fitted with Voltaic Frame (so +2 @fos[DC] for 3 pieces, or +3 @fos[DC] for 5 or more pieces)
